function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of N95 masks with exhalation valve may not provide adequate protection from airborne particles","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to airborne contaminants","Mitigation":"Use N95 masks without exhalation valves for environments potentially contaminated with SARS-CoV-2","Technologies":"N95 masks without exhalation valves","People":"Individuals wearing N95 masks with exhalation valves","Owner":"Health organizations and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Varying filtering power of disposable surgical masks depending on the model and size of aerosol particles","Impact":"Inconsistent protection from airborne contaminants","Mitigation":"Standardize the filtering power of disposable surgical masks through rigorous testing and quality control","Technologies":"Quality control measures for disposable surgical masks","People":"Manufacturers, regulatory authorities","Owner":"Regulatory authorities and quality control organizations"},{"Description":"Use of inappropriate face masks in environments potentially contaminated with SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to airborne contaminants","Mitigation":"Enforce the use of N95, FFP2, or FFP3 masks in environments potentially contaminated with SARS-CoV-2","Technologies":"N95, FFP2, and FFP3 masks","People":"Workers, healthcare professionals, general population","Owner":"Employers, healthcare institutions, government"}]}
